Name: Dark Radiation
Description: Increases Dark DMG.

Name: Chain Fusion
Description: Decreases Dark Resistance.

Name: Fire Tempered
Description: Increases Fire DMG.

Name: Scorching Invasion
Description: Decreases Fire Resistance.

Name: Frost Crystal
Description: Increases Ice DMG.

Name: Frost Corrosion
Description: Decreases Ice Resistance.

Name: Lightning Surge
Description: Increases Lightning DMG.

Name: Turbulence Interference
Description: Decreases Lightning Resistance.

Name: Battlefield Analysis
Description: Increases Physical DMG.

Name: Electron Medicine
Description: Increases Physical DMG.

Name: Ultralimit Torque
Description: Increases Physical DMG.

Name: Penetrating Pivot
Description: Physical Resistance decreases.

Name: Glorious Shield
Description: Glory's HP is reduced during battle. The remaining HP bar will be replaced by a shield that regenerates over time.

Name: Condensed Frost
Description: Glory enters this form upon a 3-Ping after conditions are met. While in this form, Glory is immune to attacks and the attacking enemy will be slowed instead.

Name: Frost Spirit
Description: When Glory's energy is full, press and hold Basic Attack to activate the Frost Spirit form, rearranging all Signal Orbs and enhancing his Basic Attack.

Name: Frost Strike
Description: Glory's Basic Attacks become enhanced in Frost Spirit form but cannot recover Signal Orbs.

Name: Blooming Shot
Description: Wanshi backsteps while shooting. If he successfully dodges the attack while backstepping, the follow-up attack will grant Invincible for a long duration and deal Ice DMG.

Name: Freeze
Description: Condense the moisture in the air, making it impossible for the enemy to perform any action.

Name: Piercing Blow
Description: Decreases Physical DEF.

Name: Spear Lunge
Description: Basic Attacks after any 3-Ping will trigger Spear Lunge and add 1 stack of Electric Charge.

Name: Song of Protection
Description: A shield provided by Selena: Capriccio. Characters are immune from attacks when the shield is active.

Name: Kowloong Unit
Description: The current Kowloong units are Qu: Pavo, Pulao: Dragontoll, and Hanying: Zitherwoe.

Name: Time Lag Calculation
Description: Some of the skill effects on the character and the enemy, Matrix cooldown, character switch cooldown, QTE cooldown, and stage timer will all be paused.

Name: Kowloong Uniframe Unit
Description: The current Kowloong Uniframe units are Qu: Pavo and Pulao: Dragontoll.

Name: Single Orb
Description: Signal Orbs that cannot form a 3-Ping or a 2-Ping.

Name: Equilibrium Disintegration
Description: Deals Extra DMG to the Equilibrium Field.

Name: Field Ultralimit
Description: Effect gained by triggering Matrix that turns the next Signal Orb pinged into a 3-Ping

Name: Crystal Field
Description: The next casting of Red/Blue Orb Combo 2 will consume one stack, granting Super Armor and 50% Damage Reduction.

Name: Frost Spirit
Description: When Glory has full energy, press and hold Basic Attack to activate the Frost Spirit form, rearranging all Signal Orbs and enhancing his Basic Attack.

Name: Frost Strike
Description: Glory's Basic Attacks become enhanced in Frost Spirit form but cannot recover Signal Orbs.

Name: Frost Corrosion
Description: Reduces the enemy's Ice Resistance by a percentage.
